Title.text: Why do you need travel insurance?
You have to cancel a trip last-minute.

Text.text: Travel insurance can reimburse you for your prepaid, non-refundable trip costs — including vacation rentals, car rentals, hotels and flights — if you have to cancel for a covered reason.
Travel insurance can reimburse you for eligible meals, accommodation and transportation expenses during a covered delay.

Title.text: You get sick or hurt when you're far from home.

Text.text: Travel insurance can reimburse you for care following a covered medical emergency while traveling. We can even arrange and pay for a medical evacuation if needed.

Title.text: You need help in a hurry.

Text.text: Whether you're planning a week-long road trip or a weekend getaway, you never know what might happen. Travel insurance gives you access to our 24-Hour Assistance hotline for expert, personalized support in a crisis.
